##task 1

sage: var ('x,y,z')
(x, y, z)
sage: K=QQ[x,y,z]
sage: A=[K(x-5*y+z-3),K(3*x-2*y+2*z-1),K(2*y+2*z+3)]
sage: T=triangulation(A)
sage: T
[x - 5*y + z - 3, 2*y + 2*z + 3, -28*z - 23]
sage: X=tsolve(T)
sage: X
[3/7, -19/28, -23/28]

##task 5
sage: var ('x,y,z')
(x, y, z)
sage: K=QQ[x,y,z]
sage: QQ[x,y,z]
Multivariate Polynomial Ring in x, y, z over Rational Field
sage: A=[K(x+y+z-1), K(x-y+z-2), K(2*x+2*z-3)]
sage: L=tsolve(triangulation(A))
sage: L
[2, -1/2, -1/2]

sage: A=[K(x+y+z+u-1), K(x-y+z+2*u-2), K(2*x+2*z+3*u-3)]
sage: L=(triangulation(A))
sage: L
